attributes.action: ZERO TOLERANCE IN DRINK AND DRIVE!!!!
attributes.additional_details: I had written to our local MP with a reply from the Minister of transport  on road  safety suggesting that the government are cracking down on drink and driving  and saying they have introduced more tougher approaches of awareness with drink driving  and feel that this a way to go.
attributes.background:
I lost my nephew age 34 to a drunk driver in March of this year, he was a kind hearted and fun person too be with. 
Volunterd for the RNLI and family and friends loved him and will miss him.

Why encourage people  to drink 2 pints of beer or 2 glasses of wine  as we are all different.
